project_descr:
This proposal is centered on two interlinked components:
a)	A scenario-based strategic thinking process in Suriname (PAPEP) and b) Building of national capacities for peaceful resolution of conflict and democratic dialogue

outputs.output_descr: A system-wide response to the crisis: a)Roll-out of a scenario-based political analysis and strategic thinking process and b)Building of national capacities for conflict prevention and democratic dialogue
